dct_title_s: Geographical, statistical, and historical map of Illinois.
dct_description_sm: London, Washington.;A list of geographical atlases, No. 1373a.;1 map, colored;29 x 21 cm., on sheets 47 x 57 cm.;ca. 1:2,200,000;Carey, H.C. and Lea I.  A complete historical, chronological and geographical american atlas. . .  -- Philadelphia, Carey & Lea, 1822. -- No. 33.
